i1.name: Shepherd of Souls
description: {{sbc|Innate- Final Service:}} '''Yorick''' raises a ''grave'' for every enemy {{tip|champion}}, large {{tip|monster}} and {{passive progression/deprecated version|3|showtype=true|12th;6th;2nd|1;7;13}} non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}}. Only 4 ''graves'' can exist at the same time, with the furthest ones being replaced by the newest. Large monsters that die near '''Yorick''' always leave a ''grave''.
'''Yorick''' can use {{ai|Awakening|Yorick}} to raise a {{as|Mist Walker|mist}} from a ''grave''.
{{sbc|Innate - The Horde:}} There can only exist 4 {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} at the same time, with the closest ones being replaced by the newest.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate- Final Service: Yorick raises a grave for every enemy champion, large monster and Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 3 showtype=true 12th;6th;2nd 1;7;13 non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with Last Rites. Only 4 graves can exist at the same time, with the furthest ones being replaced by the newest. Large monsters that die near Yorick always leave a grave.Yorick can use Awakening to raise a Mist Walker from a grave.Innate - The Horde: There can only exist 4 Mist Walkers at the same time, with the closest ones being replaced by the newest.
i1.notes: * Units dying to {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}} don't lower ''Shepherd of Souls''' counter.

w1.name: Dark Procession
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a 1-second delay, '''Yorick''' summons a circular wall of spirits around the target area that lasts up to 4 seconds, {{tip|airborne|displacing}} enemies away from it at the time of cast and acting as impassable terrain for them, while allowing allies to walk through.
''Dark Procession'' can only be targeted by enemy {{tip|champion}} basic attacks and {{tip|turret|turrets}}. It takes 1 [[damage]] per attack from champions and dissolves instantly from turret shots.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: After a 1-second delay, Yorick summons a circular wall of spirits around the target area that lasts up to 4 seconds, displacing enemies away from it at the time of cast and acting as impassable terrain for them, while allowing allies to walk through.Dark Procession can only be targeted by enemy champion basic attacks and turrets. It takes 1 damage per attack from champions and dissolves instantly from turret shots.
w1.notes: * ''Dark Procession'' triggers [[combat status|in-combat]] effects such as drawing turret aggro, applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}} and {{ri|Sudden Impact}}.

e1.name: Mourning Mist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area at the target location, dealing {{as|15% of target's '''current''' health}} {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, down to a minimum threshold.

Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} and large {{tip|monster|monsters}} hit by the Black Mist are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for 2 seconds, and are ''marked'' for 4 seconds, during which '''Yorick''', {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} and the {{ai|Eulogy of the Isles|Yorick|The Maiden}} gain {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards them.
{{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} will {{tip|dash|leap}} to enemy champions and large monsters ''cursed'' by the ''mark''.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Yorick hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area at the target location, dealing 15% of target's current health magic damage to all enemies hit, down to a minimum threshold.Enemy champions and large monsters hit by the Black Mist are slowed by 30% for 2 seconds, and are marked for 4 seconds, during which Yorick, Mist Walkers and the The Maiden gain 20% bonus movement speed when moving towards them.Mist Walkers will leap to enemy champions and large monsters cursed by the mark.
e1.notes: * The {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} do not {{tip|dash|leap}} if they are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}}.

effects.str: • Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 70% AP)

r1.name: Eulogy of the Isles
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' summons the ''Maiden of the Mist'' along with a few {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} at the target location, which remain on the battlefield until she or '''Yorick''' dies. ''Eulogy of the Isles'' can be recast once while ''The Maiden of the Mist'' is alive after 10 seconds of the activation.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Yorick''' sets ''The Maiden of the Mist'' free, allowing her to push the nearest [[lanes|lane]] until she dies.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist along with a few Mist Walkers at the target location, which remain on the battlefield until she or Yorick dies. Eulogy of the Isles can be recast once while The Maiden of the Mist is alive after 10 seconds of the activation.Recast: Yorick sets The Maiden of the Mist free, allowing her to push the nearest lanes until she dies.
r1.notes:
* See the ''Pets'' section below for more details about ''The Maiden of the Mist'' and {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}}.
* The ''Maiden'' updates her stats when '''Yorick's''' [[champion statistic|stats]] change.
* When '''Yorick''' dies, ''The Maiden'' rapidly loses portions of her {{as|'''maximum''' health}} over 3 seconds until she dies.
** The loss of {{as|'''maximum''' health}} occurs in {{fd|0.6}}-second intervals, in which she loses 20% on the first, 25% on the second, {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}%}} on the third, 50% on the fourth, and 100% on the fifth.
